prestige.title: New sauna
prestige.card.title: {name}: {value}×
prestige.flavor: The scent of charred benches promises a fresh start.
shop.title: Shop
shop.card.title: {name} ({count, number})
shop.card.subtitle: Next: {price} | +{cps} /s
buildings.descriptions.sauna: A modest steam room that turns heat into steady löyly.
buildings.descriptions.kylakauppa: Sells essentials that keep guests flowing into the sauna.
buildings.descriptions.alko: A specialty store that upsells beverages for longer sauna sessions.
buildings.descriptions.ensiapu: Staffed medics make sure overzealous bathers return for another round.
buildings.descriptions.baari: A cozy bar that keeps spirits high and wallets open.
buildings.descriptions.cittari: Bulk supplies cut costs and attract tour buses of sauna fans.
buildings.descriptions.sateri: Luxurious lodging bundles spa treatments with exclusive heat sessions.
buildings.descriptions.kasino: High rollers trade chips for steam, boosting nightly revenue.
buildings.descriptions.kirkko: Blessings and community events draw faithful patrons to warm up.
buildings.descriptions.vankila: Rehabilitated inmates keep the stoves burning around the clock.
buildings.descriptions.bordelli: A discreet establishment that guarantees full occupancy nightly.
buildings.descriptions.kampus: Student clubs turn sauna theory into relentless experimentation.
buildings.descriptions.tehdas: Industrial heaters mass-produce löyly with ruthless efficiency.
buildings.descriptions.parlamenttitalo: Policy makers divert national funding into deluxe steamworks.
buildings.flavor.sauna: The bench creaks, but the hiss of water on stone feels like home.
buildings.flavor.kylakauppa: Every villager knows the back shelf hides the best birch whisks.
buildings.flavor.alko: The clerk swears the cooling drinks are purely medicinal.
buildings.flavor.ensiapu: Cold packs, rehydration salts, and encouraging nods await.
buildings.flavor.baari: Stories get taller with every round of sauna-cured ale.
buildings.flavor.cittari: Aisle thirteen somehow always smells like fresh birch.
buildings.flavor.sateri: Velvet robes, private benches, and whispered reservations.
buildings.flavor.kasino: House rule: every jackpot ends with a celebratory löyly.
buildings.flavor.kirkko: Hymns drift through the steam, mingling with the scent of tar.
buildings.flavor.vankila: Guarded benches, disciplined pours, no questions asked.
buildings.flavor.bordelli: The steam is thick with secrets and expensive perfume.
buildings.flavor.kampus: Lecture notes curl in the humidity, but the ideas are hot.
buildings.flavor.tehdas: Machine rhythms sync with the sizzle of water on iron.
buildings.flavor.parlamenttitalo: Lobbyists compare heat levels between votes.
tech.title: Technologies
tech.descriptions.vihta: Traditional birch whisk that invigorates skin and raises morale.
tech.descriptions.kalja: Chilled drinks keep bathers lingering and spending longer.
tech.descriptions.kossu: A stronger spirit that convinces skeptics to stay for one more round.
tech.descriptions.kiulu_ja_kauha: Perfect throws of water ensure every bench gets even heat.
tech.descriptions.saunalakki: Protective felt hats let patrons tolerate brutal temperatures.
tech.descriptions.lampomittari: Precision instruments keep the stove dialed to optimal output.
tech.descriptions.burana: Over-the-counter relief keeps the town's sore shoulders returning.
tech.descriptions.saunatuoksu: Infused aromas transform the room into a fragrant forest.
tech.descriptions.saunaklonkku: A mythical helper who mysteriously stokes the coals while you sleep.
tech.descriptions.uraanikivet: Forbidden stones radiate unstoppable heat for daring hosts.
tech.descriptions.kamehameha: Harnesses anime-grade ki to launch industrial-scale steam blasts.
tech.descriptions.hawkingin_loylygeneraa: Exotic physics bends time to recycle every particle of steam.
tech.flavor.vihta: Fresh leaves snap with a satisfying sting.
tech.flavor.kalja: Foam stays frosty even in the hottest steam.
tech.flavor.kossu: The smell of rye and rebellion fills the changing room.
tech.flavor.kiulu_ja_kauha: The wooden ladle is worn smooth by countless practiced flicks.
tech.flavor.lampomittari: When the needle trembles past the limit, cheers erupt.
tech.flavor.saunatuoksu: Hint of pine, hint of nostalgia, hint of marketing genius.
tech.flavor.saunaklonkku: You never see it work, but the embers are always ready at dawn.
tech.flavor.uraanikivet: They glow with a reassuringly unstable hum.
tech.flavor.kamehameha: Yelling the name absolutely increases output.
tech.flavor.hawkingin_loylygeneraattori: Warning: may spontaneously lecture about black holes.
cardDetails.label.remaining: {remaining, plural, one {# purchase left} other {# purchases left}}
cardDetails.building.notEnough: You need more heat before buying this building.
cardDetails.tech.notEnough: You need more heat before buying this technology.
cardDetails.prestige.warning: Burning resets progress but grants a permanent production bonus.
cardDetails.prestige.unavailable: Earn more heat to burn the sauna.

maailma.title: World Shop
maailma.stackModeTooltip.add: Bonuses add together at each level.
maailma.stackModeTooltip.mult: Bonuses multiply with each other at each level.
maailma.floorTooltip: Effect cannot reduce the value below {value}.
maailma.tooltip.noAsh: You don't earn Ash yet from burning the world.
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_viisaus.name: Wisdom of Ash
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_viisaus.descript: Permanent +10% bonus to technology multipliers per level (additive).
maailma.upgrades.ikuiset_hiillokset.name: Eternal Embers
maailma.upgrades.ikuiset_hiillokset.desc: All buildings' base production ×1.20 per level (multiplicative).
maailma.upgrades.feeniks_sauna.name: Phoenix Sauna
maailma.upgrades.feeniks_sauna.descripti: Each Burn Sauna starts with at least ×2 base multiplier.
maailma.upgrades.maailmankivi.name: Worldstone
maailma.upgrades.maailmankivi.descriptio: Unlock the next tier one level earlier (−1 tier unlock).
maailma.upgrades.tyhjyys_tehokkuus.name: Void Efficiency
maailma.upgrades.tyhjyys_tehokkuus.descr: Reduces building cost multiplier by 0.01 per level (e.g. 1.15 → 1.14).
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_infuusio.name: Ash Infusion
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_infuusio.descrip: Permanent +1% global CPS per unlocked tier above T7 for each level.
maailma.upgrades.alkulampo.name: Primordial Heat
maailma.upgrades.kuolematon_saunan_henki: Technologies persist through Burn Sauna (or are refunded immediately).
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_riimu.name: Ash Rune
maailma.upgrades.tuhkan_riimu.descriptio: Each Ash spent grants +0.05% permanent global CPS bonus (stacks).
maailma.description: Type “{phrase}” to confirm. This resets the current world and begins a new era.
maailma.modal.label: Confirm by burning the world
maailma.toast.none: The world burned, but you earned no new Ash.
